heading: Infomercials.
general-note: This heading is used as a topical heading for works about program-length television commercials that are devoted to one product, and that usually include a discussion or demonstration. Works about live television programs that purvey a wide variety of goods that can be purchased by the viewers are entered under. Home shopping television programs.. When used as topical headings they are subdivided by the appropriate geographic, topical, and/or form subdivisions..
